shows.title: When the Sun Sets on Us
shows.description: Ethan finds secret photos of his girlfriend Nancy with her old flame, Mark. Heartbroken, he leaves her and agrees to take over his family business abroad. But Nancy, unaware he knows, keeps getting close to Mark—right in front of him. Would you like a tagline added for extra impact?

shows.description: Why Must The Boss Contractly Marry

shows.title: WILD YOUNG MASTER SON-IN-LAW
shows.description:
Mocked, scarred, and trapped in a cruel marriage, she had lost everything—until he returned. Now claimed by the most feared man alive, her fall becomes the spark for a powerful rise.
Wild Young Master Son-in-Law is a storm of revenge, redemption, and a love that won’t bow.

shows.title: Wonder Boy Parth
shows.description: In a tale of betrayal and redemption, a visually impaired man named Parth harnesses ancient mystical powers from his mother’s locket to seek justice against those who wronged him, uncovering priceless treasures and battling dark forces in a city ruled by greed and deception.

shows.title: Yes Mr. CEO, We Have A Baby
shows.description: Six years after a scandal ruined her life, Shirley returns home with her son to uncover the truth. Working at her sister’s fiancé Neil’s company, unexpected sparks fly — and her son feels an odd bond with him. As secrets unravel, Shirley is determined to find out what really happened that fateful night.

shows.title: You Are like the Wind Passing by My Pillow
shows.description:
Stella adored her husband George — until love turned into betrayal. While she trusted blindly, he lived a double life of lies, crime, and secret affairs, using her as a perfect cover.
But when the truth unravels, Stella must decide seek revenge or vanish — leaving George to face the storm he created.

shows.title: മറുപിറവി
shows.description: ചരിത്രവും കഥയും ഭാവനയും സമകാലികസംഭവങ്ങളും ഇഴചേർന്ന് ഒരു മറുപിറവി സംഭവിക്കുകയാണിവിടെ. സ്വന്തം ദേശത്തിന്റെ സ്വത്വസംസ്‌കാരങ്ങൾ തേടിക്കൊണ്ടുള്ള ഒരു നോവലിസ്റ്റിന്റെ അന്വേഷണയാത്ര. നോവലിനുള്ളിൽ മറ്റൊരു നോവൽ പിറവിയെടുക്കുന്ന ആഖ്യാന സൗകുമാര്യം. സേതുവിൻ്റെ സമാനതകളില്ലാത്ത ഒരു രചന.
